price:
کەواتە لەنێوان من و ئەواندا حوکم بدە، بەحوکم دانێکی یەکجاری
و من و ئەو باوڕدارانەی لەگەڵمدان ڕزگار بکە
arabic: فَٱفۡتَحۡ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَهُمۡ فَتۡحٗا وَنَجِّنِي وَمَن مَّعِيَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-if'taḥ baynī wabaynahum fatḥan wanajjinī waman maʿiya mina al-mu'minīna
